item.title: Railway → México City
item.description: This time, Railway visited México City.

item.title: Spacing and Density
item.description: Spacing is used in visual design to create visual relationships and hierarchy. Think of space as the “empty” space you leave between one note and the next one to form rhythm. Have you noticed how the horizontal space between characters (tracking) is smaller than the blank space we put between “groups” of letter we call words, and how that space is smaller than the vertical space between vertical lines? So now we have lines.

item.title: Railway Metal
item.description: For the release of our Metal regions, I decided to make a conmemorative tshirt, of course featuring a fake trash metal logo
